title: Installation
fullText:
Vertical-type earth electrodes shall be driven to a minimum depth of:
•	(a) in Australia, 1.2 m; and
•	(b) in New Zealand, 1.8 m.
Strip-type earth electrodes buried in a horizontal trench shall be laid at a depth having not less than 0.5 m cover and with a minimum horizontal length of:
•	(i) in Australia, 3 m; and
•	(ii) in New Zealand, 7.5 m.
